Securityboulevard.title: Avast Speaks at Virtual Digital Sanity Summit | Avast

Securityboulevard.title: Take My Daughter to Work Days
Securityboulevard.description: It took me a long time to find my voice at work. I finally did it by embracing motherhood. As we approach International Women’s Day, I’m sharing my tips for making teams more female-friendly. Mary and her daughter on the road. For the past three years, the pa…

It took me a long time to find my voice at work. I finally did it by embracing motherhood. As we approach International Womens Day, Im sharing my tips for making teams more female-friendly.

Jessestommel.author: Jesse Stommel
Jessestommel.title: What If We Didn't Grade? A Bibliography
Jessestommel.description: Jesse Stommel, Mar 05, 2020 I'm less inclined to call this a bibliography, which suggests some sense of completeness, and more like a set of starting points. I'm not even sure it's just a bibliography about ungrading, beginning as it does with Alfie Kohn and …
